title: JHIN IS THAT REAL FUR ?
body:
http://imgur.com/YecDZWg

LOL I giggled maybe a lot.

I was wondering how many responses it will take to find this comment.
Not with that username it's not
If I was jhin, id do the same thing. Ahri's tale are a turn off.
Heathen! Ahri's tail's are super important! You must pet them!

> [{quoted}](name=Lt Streko,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=pRF3REvZ,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-02-07T05:02:04.664+0000)

Priscilla and Sith were the two bosses I felt bad for after killing

> [{quoted}](name=Faceroll Tactics,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=pRF3REvZ,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-07T13:01:00.478+0000)
>
> Priscilla and Sith were the two bosses I felt bad for after killing

Well for me I felt bad for many bosses in DkS1. Besides those 2 you've mention I also felt bad for Pinwheel (after reading their lore speculation), Quelaag, Ceaseless Discharge, Ornstein, Artorias and Gwyn. But that's me.

And off-topic.

http://plays.tv/video/57c4b40be9ac5cdb6d/mfw-minionblocked

The urge to pet them may come at a bad time.
False. You must touch the fluffy tails. It's the second most important part.
you mean third? ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
My question is, what's your first and second?
The beautiful twins  ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
I almost shit myself laughing
thank you
The remaining question is what's the first for you?
_Booty._ And not the pirate kind.

I can now imagine ahri checking her tail "that son of a bi@#$, JHIN GET YOUR A@# BACK HERE!!!!"

edit: In case your wondering, I just find it funnier if its "bleeped"

Is woad scout Quinn's white fur real?

welcome to M&-
wait, this is Misc?
I guess we know what happens after the "A new Challenger (Ahri) Approaches!" notification now.

> JHIN IS THAT REAL FUR ?

"I don't know, I bought it from that trashbag-wearing hobo in the woods." - {{champion:202}}.

..................

> SO HOBO IS THAT REAL FUR?

"Ho- huh? Oh the fur? This fur is fake." - {{champion:77}}.
